mapper.select: select h.hotels_name, b.booking_code, b.booking_date, b.booking_check_in, b.booking_check_out, b.booking_total_price from hotels h, booking b where b.member_id = #{memberId} and b.hotels_code = h.hotels_code
mapper.update: update booking set booking_status = 'C', booking_cancel_date = to_date(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') where booking_code = #{bookingCode}
